About Upstack Data
Upstack Data is a remote-first software company specializing in utilizing data to drive intelligent marketing decisions. We prioritize merit, excellence, and intelligence—focusing on impactful results rather than checkboxes. Our culture thrives on asynchronous collaboration, continuous learning, and customer-centric innovation, enabling our teams to work autonomously while staying highly connected.

Role Overview
As the Chief of Staff at Upstack Data, you will serve as the right hand to our executive leadership, ensuring seamless coordination across strategic priorities, operations, and cross-functional teams. You’ll leverage your organizational acumen to orchestrate key initiatives, streamline decision-making, and help scale the company’s impact. This is a high-visibility role with the potential to significantly influence Upstack Data’s growth trajectory.

Key Responsibilities
Executive Support & Administration
Executive Support: Provide day-to-day support to the CEO and executive team, including meeting preparation, agenda setting, and follow-up actions, inbox and communications management
Calendar Management: Coordinate complex schedules across multiple time zones, schedule meetings, manage conflicts, and optimize executive time allocation 
Email Management: Monitor, prioritize, and respond to emails on behalf of executives; draft professional correspondence and maintain organized email systems
Travel Coordination: Plan and book domestic and international travel including flights, accommodations, ground transportation, and detailed itineraries
Meeting Support: Prepare meeting agendas, coordinate logistics, take detailed notes, and manage follow-up action items
Document Management: Create, edit, and maintain important documents, presentations, contracts, and reports using various software platforms
Technical Operations & Tool Management
CRM Administration: Manage customer relationships in HubSpot including data entry, pipeline management, contact organization, and reporting
E-commerce Support: Assist with Shopify store operations including product uploads, order management, customer service, and basic troubleshooting 
Email Marketing: Create and manage email campaigns through various platforms, maintain subscriber lists, and analyze performance metrics
AI Tools Integration: Utilize ChatGPT, Claude, and other AI tools to optimize workflows, generate content, and enhance productivity
Data Management: Maintain accurate databases, create reports, and ensure data integrity across all platforms
Project Management & Coordination
Task Prioritization: Manage multiple projects simultaneously, set priorities, track deadlines, and ensure timely completion
Team Coordination: Facilitate communication between teaUpgrade to see actual infombers, coordinate project timelines, and manage collaborative workflows
Process Documentation: Create and maintain standard operating procedures (SOPs) for recurring tasks and processes
Quality Assurance: Review work for accuracy, completeness, and adherence to company standards before final delivery
Communication & Relationship Management
Client Interaction: Serve as a professional point of contact for clients, partners, and vendors via phone, email, and video calls
Internal Communication: Facilitate clear communication between departments and ensure all stakeholders are informed of relevant updates
Professional Representation: Represent the executive and company with professionalism, discretion, and excellent judgment in all interactions

Qualifications
Experience:
- 5+ years of experience in strategic operations, project management, or a similar leadership role within a fast-paced, tech-forward environment.
- Exceptional written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to facilitate smooth collaboration in an async, remote setting.
- Adaptability: Comfortable working in a fast-evolving, high-growth environment, balancing multiple priorities with precision.
- Education:
Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Business, Management, or a related field (or equivalent experience).

Why Join Us?
Remote-First Culture: Work from anywhere while staying closely connected through modern collaboration tools.
Growth Opportunities: Benefit from our merit-based approach and take your career to the next level.
Cutting-Edge Environment: Collaborate with forward-thinking professionals dedicated to data, excellence, and relentless innovation.
Impactful Work: Shape the future of data-driven marketing performance for a global client base.
